mapper.select: SELECT si.song_id AS songId, si.song_name AS songName, si.song_cover AS songCover, sin.singer_name AS singerName FROM song_info si LEFT JOIN singer_info sin ON si.singer_id = sin.singer_id AND sin.delete_flag = 0 -- 将歌手过滤条件放在JOIN条件里 WHERE si.song_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND si.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY si.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT s.song_id AS songId, s.song_name AS songName, si.singer_id AS singerId, si.singer_name AS singerName, s.song_duration AS songDuration, s.song_cover AS songCover, s.song_release_date AS songReleaseDate, a.album_id AS albumId, a.album_name AS albumName, sm.mv_id AS mvId FROM song_info s LEFT JOIN singer_info si ON s.singer_id = si.singer_id AND si.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN album_info a ON s.album_id = a.album_id AND a.delete_flag = 0 left join song_mv sm on s.song_id = sm.song_id and sm.delete_flag = 0 WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY s.play_count DESC LIMIT 50

-- 查询歌曲飙升榜记录，按增长率降序排列，最多返回50条记录 SELECT s.song_id AS songId, s.song_name AS songName, si.singer_id AS singerId, si.singer_name AS singerName, s.song_duration AS songDuration, s.song_cover AS songCover, s.song_release_date AS songReleaseDate, a.album_id AS albumId, a.album_name AS albumName, sm.mv_id AS mvId FROM song_info s left join song_mv sm on sm.song_id = s.song_id and delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN singer_info si ON s.singer_id = si.singer_id AND si.delete_flag = 0 -- 关联歌手信息，且歌手未被删除 LEFT JOIN album_info a ON s.album_id = a.album_id AND a.delete_flag = 0 -- 关联专辑信息，且专辑未被删除 LEFT JOIN song_play_daily yesterday ON s.song_id = yesterday.song_id AND yesterday.`date` = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) -- 关联昨天播放量 LEFT JOIN song_play_daily two_days_ago ON s.song_id = two_days_ago.song_id AND two_days_ago.`date` = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 DAY) -- 关联前天播放量 WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 -- 只查询未被删除的歌曲 AND (yesterday.play_count IS NOT NULL OR two_days_ago.play_count IS NOT NULL) -- 确保昨天或前天的播放量数据存在 ORDER BY (COALESCE(yesterday.play_count, 0) - COALESCE(two_days_ago.play_count, 0)) DESC -- 按增长率降序排列 LIMIT 50 -- 最多返回50条记录

SELECT s.song_id, s.song_name, s.song_duration, s.song_cover, s.song_release_date, s.singer_id, si.singer_name, s.album_id, a.album_name FROM song_info s JOIN singer_info si ON s.singer_id = si.singer_id JOIN album_info a ON s.album_id = a.album_id WHERE s.singer_id = #{singerId} AND s.delete_flag = 0 AND si.delete_flag = 0 AND a.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY s.play_count DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT s.song_id AS songId, s.song_name AS songName, s.song_duration AS songDuration, s.song_release_date AS songReleaseDate, s.song_cover AS songCover, s.song_file_path AS songFilePath, s.song_lyrics AS songLyrics, s.singer_id AS singerId, si.singer_name AS singerName, s.album_id AS albumId, ai.album_name AS albumName, sm.mv_id AS mvId, s.play_count AS playCount, s.create_time AS createTime, s.update_time AS updateTime FROM song_info s LEFT JOIN singer_info si ON s.singer_id = si.singer_id AND si.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN song_mv sm ON s.song_id = sm.song_id AND sm.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN album_info ai ON s.album_id = ai.album_id AND ai.delete_flag = 0 WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 AND s.album_id = #{albumId}

SELECT s.song_id AS songId, s.song_name AS songName, s.song_duration AS songDuration, s.song_cover AS songCover, s.song_release_date AS songReleaseDate, si.singer_id AS singerId, si.singer_name AS singerName, a.album_id AS albumId, a.album_name AS albumName, sm.mv_id AS mvId FROM song_info s LEFT JOIN singer_info si ON s.singer_id = si.singer_id AND si.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN album_info a ON s.album_id = a.album_id AND a.delete_flag = 0 left join song_mv sm on s.song_id = sm.song_id and sm.delete_flag = 0 WHERE s.song_release_date >= #{startTime} AND s.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY s.song_release_date DESC LIMIT #{limit}
